alert.note: Alert for Dukes (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 15 at 3:52PM EDT until September 16 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT SUNDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 2 PM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 3 to 10 feet in the surf zone. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.5 to 4.0 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Dukes MA County. * WHEN...For the High Surf Advisory, until 8 AM EDT Sunday. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, from midnight tonight to 2 PM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected, primarily in Edgartown and Vineyard Haven. Some coastal roads may see debris wash onshore. Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and beach erosion. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Vineyard Haven MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/01 AM 3.0/ 3.5 1.0/ 1.5 1.4/ 1.9 5 None 17/01 AM 0.8/ 1.3 -1.3/-0.8 -0.9/-0.4 2 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.
